extendedInfo.description: Lithic transforms your photos into realistic mini comic book / graphic novels providing customisations for layout, captions and more.  Its state of the art filter creates effects from Van Gogh's painterly style to the harsh and gritty film noir look of Frank Miller. Features include:1. Eight photo layouts.2. A highly customizable filter that lets you achieve a range of creative effects such as graphic novel, woodcut, pencil and oil-painting.3. Customizable caption for each panel in the layout.4. A gallery for viewing your stylized images.New features and improvements are in the works so keep watching this space!As always we love to hear what our users think. Please feel free to contact us with ideas and comments. We value your feedback! A big thank you to everyone so far who have written in with suggestions and words of support!Share your lithic images and tips with the #lithic hashtag on google+ and twitter. We love to see your creations!BUG REPORTING:We hate to see a bug stop you from creating beautiful images so please let us know when you find one. We do prefer users to email us directly with the problem because it's easier for us to communicate with you if we need more info and can let you know as soon as we have a fix ready. It's easy to email us inside the app: just touch the version number circle on the home screen and select 'Feedback' in the pop-up menu. If the app crashes and asks you to send a bug report, do so. The more info you can provide for us, the faster we can track down the bug and post up a fix.  Tags: photo, art filter, comic book, graphic novel, oil painting, woodcut

reviews.title: Great app, but now I can\'t resize images.
reviews.comment: This app is a lot of fun to play with. Unfortunately, I can no longer resize images in the app. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app, but to no avail. If you can fix that, I will totally give you 5 stars!
reviews.author: Stacey Padula

reviews.title: Great start
reviews.comment: Very cool app. Would love to see color and an undo option, but so far it\'s very nice. Good work!
reviews.author: mark christianson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app. Such a unique treatment. Lots of fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Fun app, wonderful effects with the click of a button. I LOVE IT!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A COOL APP
reviews.comment: Its cool but needs more templates and more trimming options.  Otherwise it is a very cool app.
reviews.author: MARK NELSON

reviews.title: Horrible gui
reviews.comment: I\'m really bummed that I paid for this. The effects are interesting, but the user interface is so horrible, it\'s not worth using.
reviews.author: Dan Lynch

reviews.title: Above most.
reviews.comment: I like it. Hard to get pics to look as cool as what they show as examples though: but, fun none-the-less!!  A tutorial on what type of pics work best would be cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool and fun
reviews.comment: I do not often buy apps and I rate them even less, but I had to rate this one. The effects it makes are awesome and the control you have works well for the process. My only wish was more square templates... yes for instagram.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add some style
reviews.comment: While limited to one type of filter, the range of adjustments means a wide variety of styles are available.  Built in tutorial shows you what you need, couldnt ask for more besides more filter types.  If you like the style on the sames pick this up.  New version fixed all issues I had encontered.  A program from devs who pay attention.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This a beautiful application. It is easy to use and inspirational.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this app.
reviews.comment: Diptic and lythic photography have been a passion of mine for a while. I just wished I could choose the filters and have more control over how they\'ll end up looking.
reviews.author: Juan Carlos Sanchez

reviews.title: Cool but...
reviews.comment: Why the stupid tiling? I want to see one photo but 20. A little more control over sizing, colors and filters would be cool too.
reviews.author: cian smith

reviews.title: Great...one buck I\'ll never see again.
reviews.comment: Upon trying this app I found that one of the most Important features, being able to scale-crop the image within the canvas didn\'t work, leaving a tiling effect which didn\'t exactly work for me. In addition to this there is no way that I can tell to choose the resolution of the finished image. Using a 720p base image the finished product was a little more than 600px square. This is really disappointing because the effect of the filter itself is great.
reviews.author: Robert Elm

reviews.title: Clunky
reviews.comment: Wish there was a trial version. Interface isn\'t the best IMO. Very clunky and confusing even when described to be so easy. I see how its supposed to work but the functions just either aren\'t responsive or are over sensitive.
reviews.author: Mike J

reviews.title: Pretty original
reviews.comment: Lots of fun but can\'t get pinch zoom to work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Size for instagram sharing?
reviews.comment: I like the app,  it\'s fun but i hope they add an instagram sized template on the next update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great style, little customization
reviews.comment: This has some great features, and likes well made throughout. However among captions is severely limited (can\'t change font type or size) and can\'t change zoom of image in canvas, which means that many photos will repeat.   Help suggests you can change zoom of image, but on nexus 4 I am unable to.
reviews.author: Matt Kendon

reviews.title: A great app, compatibility crippled on the Nexus 7.
reviews.comment: I used this on my Galaxy S2 and made some awesome little montages. This needs SERIOUS localisation either for the N7 or for Jellybean as the aforementioned scaling issue makes gallery photo sizing/processing impossible on my tablet. Five stars when you fix this and I *will* be back.
reviews.author: Ben Jewitt

reviews.title: Crash issue fixed!
reviews.comment: Works perfectly now! Swift response!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: An excellent app...it\'s fun ..
reviews.author: Zyrena Swiggett
